00049 //
00050 // UnnecessaryNodeRemoverCopier
00051 //
00052 // 17 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_UNNECESSARYNODEREMOVERCOPIER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_UNNECESSARYNODEREMOVERCOPIER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/QuerySpec.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/delete_range.hpp"
00060 
00061 class UnnecessaryNodeRemoverCopier : public indri::lang::Copier {
00062 protected:
00063   std::vector<indri::lang::Node*> _nodes;
00064 
00065   class SingleChildWalker : public indri::lang::Walker { 
00066   private:
00067     indri::lang::Node* _child;
00068     int _children;
00069     bool _seenRoot;
00070 
00071   public:
00072     SingleChildWalker() : _seenRoot(false), _children(0), _child(0) {}
00073 
00074     void defaultBefore( indri::lang::Node* n ) {
00075       if( !_seenRoot ) {
00076         _seenRoot = true;
00077       } else {
00078         _children++;
00079         _child = n;
00080       }
00081     }
00082 
00083     bool onlyOneChild() {
00084       return _children == 1;
00085     }
00086 
00087     indri::lang::Node* getChild() {
00088       return _child;
00089     }
00090   };
00091 
00092 public:
00093   ~UnnecessaryNodeRemoverCopier() {
00094     delete_vector_contents( _nodes );
00095   }
00096 
00097   indri::lang::Node* defaultAfter( indri::lang::Node* old, indri::lang::Node* newNode ) {
00098     _nodes.push_back( newNode );
00099     return newNode;
00100   }
00101 
00102   indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::ExtentAnd* oldAnd, indri::lang::ExtentAnd* newAnd ) {
00103     SingleChildWalker walker;
00104     newAnd->walk(walker);
00105 
00106     if( walker.onlyOneChild() ) {
00107       delete newAnd;
00108       return walker.getChild();
00109     } else {
00110       _nodes.push_back( newAnd );
00111       return newAnd;
00112     }
00113   }
00114 
00115   indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::ExtentOr* oldOr, indri::lang::ExtentOr* newOr ) {
00116     SingleChildWalker walker;
00117     newOr->walk(walker);
00118 
00119     if( walker.onlyOneChild() ) {
00120       delete newOr;
00121       return walker.getChild();
00122     } else {
00123       _nodes.push_back( newOr );
00124       return newOr;
00125     }
00126   }
00127 
00128   indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::ODNode* oldOD, indri::lang::ODNode* newOD ) {
00129     SingleChildWalker walker;
00130     newOD->walk(walker);
00131 
00132     if( walker.onlyOneChild() ) {
00133       delete newOD;
00134       return walker.getChild();
00135     } else {
00136       _nodes.push_back( newOD );
00137       return newOD;
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00141   indri::lang::Node* after( indri::lang::UWNode* oldUW, indri::lang::UWNode* newUW ) {
00142     SingleChildWalker walker;
00143     newUW->walk(walker);
00144 
00145     if( walker.onlyOneChild() ) {
00146       delete newUW;
00147       return walker.getChild();
00148     } else {
00149       _nodes.push_back( newUW );
00150       return newUW;
00151     }
00152   }
00153 };
00154 
00155 #endif // INDRI_UNNECESSARYNODEREMOVERCOPIER_HPP
